tool_description: Convert between dates and times. Make your website or data correct with this perfect API for you.
name: Epoch Converter
title: Epoch Converter

api_list.name: seconds_simplified
api_list.description: Convert seconds to get days, hours, minutes, seconds. (Seconds) -> Days: 1, Hours: 3, Minutes: 46, Seconds: 40

api_list.name: start_end_date_to_time
api_list.description: Convert datetime to get start timestamp and end timestamp. (year, month, day Hours:Minutes:Seconds) -> 1674864000.0, 1674950399.0

api_list.name: date_to_time
api_list.description: Convert datetime to timestamp. (year, month, day Hours:Minutes:Seconds) -> 1674919760

api_list.name: time_to_date
api_list.description: Convert timestamp to datetime. (year, month, day Hours:Minutes:Seconds)
